alert.note: Alert for Iberia; St. Martin; St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 8:50PM CDT until September 07 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Iberia Parish in south central Louisiana... Northwestern St. Mary Parish in south central Louisiana... West central St. Martin Parish in south central Louisiana... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 850 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Loreauville, or near New Iberia, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Iberia, Jeanerette, Avery Island, Delcambre, Loreauville, Lydia, Lake Fausse Pointe, Acadiana Regional Airport, Jefferson Island, and Weeks Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
